issue.title: Argument 2 passed to Cake\I18n\Package::addMessage() must be of the type string, array given
issue.body:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9105243/102802379-d618f200-43b6-11eb-9f7c-bbd50764e43f.png)

I get this error after I upgraded my CakePHP 4 app to 4.2 and my DebugKit to 4.4.1

The error is not "shown" directly in the debug_kit or in the frontend but it is present when I got to the URL the debug_kit tries to open when clicking on the "Timer" tab.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9105243/102802484-03fe3680-43b7-11eb-96e9-9d59db28bbee.png)

I got the following URL from the network tab of my browser.

My URL was: http://myapp/debug-kit/panels/view/19671143-3e02-416d-93e6-a6607fce1130

The Problem - see the xdebug state here:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9105243/102802253-ab2e9e00-43b6-11eb-8f68-2c4bba2d972b.png)

body: Do you have an example of a po/mo file that cause this problem?

I wasn't able to reproduce this problem locally. I copied the translations file you provided `resources/locales/en_US/default.po` to my local application and added:

```php
<?= __('actions.ok') ?>
```
to a template. It was translated properly. Have you tried clearing the cache on your application?
https://github.com/cakephp/debug_kit/issues/811 seems to have the same issue, with sqlite db and cache cleared etc.

Please try this, this to reproduce the error:

1. Create a translatable string: __('string');
2. create a pot file with _bin/cake i18n_ then create a po file with Poeditor (default.po)
3. translate it (create a mo file)
4. modify the __('string') to __d('domain', 'string')
5. create a pot file with _bin/cake i18n_ for the _domain_ then create a po file with Poeditor (domain.po)
6. translate it (create a mo file)

You should see the error. So, you must have the same string in two different files (default.mo and domain.mo).

issue.title: Fix type error.

repository.name: cakephp
repository.description: CakePHP: The Rapid Development Framework for PHP - Official Repository

issue.body:
Translations messages can be string or array. Fixes #15231

body: Thank you a lot once again for the amazingly fast fix and your great work here!

For those who can't wait till the this patch is released in a version:

Adjust your composer.json to have this set `"cakephp/cakephp": "dev-issue-15231 as 4.2",` 
and perform a `composer update`
Ah sure since it is already merged into master
Thank you for the detailed steps @bor-attila. I will get another release out this week.
